name: gitconfig_helper.py
observations: Core utility script for Git operations
Dependency: rich library for formatted console output (auto-installs if missing)
Functions: print_aliases(), cleanup_branches(force=False)
cleanup_branches(force=False) deletes branches based on remote tracking status
Default behavior: Deletes only branches with deleted remotes (merged branches with [gone])
With --force flag: Also deletes local-only branches that never had a remote
No interactive prompts - safe for automation and git aliases
Called via git aliases in .gitconfig using pattern: !python $USERPROFILE/Documents/Scripts/gitconfig/gitconfig_helper.py function_name $@
